name: Watchmen: The End Is Nigh Part 1
name_original: Watchmen: The End Is Nigh Part 1
description:
Watchmen: The End Is Nigh Part 1 is an action game developed by Deadline Games. It came out on 04-03-2009. Warner Bros. Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Watchmen: The End Is Nigh Part 1 on PC and PlayStation 3.
